wikipedia_page.main: Joseph White is a Scottish former footballer who played as a full-back.

response: Joseph or Joe White may refer to:
* Joe White (ice hockey) (born 1988), English ice hockey goaltender
*List of Hawaii Five-0 (2010 TV series) characters#Joe White
* Julius W. "Mr. Joe" White Sr., a shoeshine man in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, United States for whom Mr. Joe White Avenue is named
